data.body:
in the upper left of the terminal title bar, just after the bead title there is a red circle.  instead make it a bright blue circle that matches the color palette, and it should flash/flicker as an indicator to the user that process is running.

when the process is terminated, the blue dot should be replaced with [terminated] in red letters.
